#include "commo.h"
#include "../rcc/graph.h"
#include "../rcc/graph_marshaler.h"
#include "../command.h"
#include "../procedure.h"
#include "../command_marshaler.h"
#include "raft_rpc.h"
#include "macros.h"

namespace janus {

RaftCommo::RaftCommo(PollMgr* poll) : Communicator(poll) {
}

shared_ptr<RaftReqVoteQuorumEvent>
RaftCommo::SendRequestVote(parid_t par_id,
                              siteid_t site_id,
                                uint64_t arg1,
                                uint64_t arg2,
                                uint64_t candidateLogTerm,
                                uint64_t candidateLogIndex) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto e = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<RaftReqVoteQuorumEvent>(4, 2);
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first != site_id) {
      Coroutine::Sleep(10);
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [site_id,e](Future* fu) {
        /* this is a handler that will be invoked when the RPC returns */
        uint64_t ret1;
        uint64_t nVotes = 0;
        bool_t vote_granted;
        /* retrieve RPC return values in order */
        fu->get_reply() >> ret1; 
        fu->get_reply() >> vote_granted;
        
          nVotes++;
          //cout<<"Request Vote completed with response revceived at "<<site_id<<endl;
          e->FeedResponse(vote_granted,ret1);
        
        
        /* process the RPC response here */
      };
      /* Always use Call_Async(proxy, RPC name, RPC args..., fuattr)
      * to asynchronously invoke RPCs */
      Call_Async(proxy, RequestVote, arg1, arg2, candidateLogTerm,candidateLogIndex, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return e;
}



shared_ptr<IntEvent>
RaftCommo::SendEmptyAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                              siteid_t site_id,
                       uint64_t leaderTerm,
                       uint64_t prevLogIndex,
                       uint64_t prevLogTerm,
                       uint64_t leaderCommitIndex,
                       siteid_t leader_id,
                        uint64_t* followerTerm,
                         bool_t* followerAppendOk
                                ) {
  /*
   * Example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
   
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;


      fuattr.callback = [followerAppendOk,followerTerm,ev](Future* fu) {
        //Log_info("incoming future callback from append entries servers");
       
        fu->get_reply() >> *followerAppendOk;
        fu->get_reply() >> *followerTerm;
        if(ev->status_<=Event::WAIT){
          ev->Set(1);
        }

      };

      Call_Async(proxy, EmptyAppendEntries, leaderTerm, prevLogIndex,prevLogTerm, leaderCommitIndex, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> RaftCommo::SendAppendEntries(parid_t par_id,
                                  siteid_t site_id,
                                  vector<shared_ptr<Marshallable>>& cmd,
                                  vector<uint64_t> terms,
                                  uint64_t leaderTerm,
                                  uint64_t prevLogIndex,
                                  uint64_t prevLogTerm,
                                  uint64_t leaderCommitIndex,
                                  siteid_t leaderId,
                                  uint64_t* followerTerm,
                                  bool_t* followerAppendOk) {
  /*
   * More example code for sending a single RPC to server at site_id
   * You may modify and use this function or just use it as a reference
   */
    auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
    auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
   
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;


      fuattr.callback = [followerAppendOk,followerTerm,ev](Future* fu) {
        //Log_info("incoming future callback from append entries servers");
       
        fu->get_reply() >> *followerAppendOk;
        fu->get_reply() >> *followerTerm;
        if(ev->status_<=Event::WAIT){
          ev->Set(1);
        }
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      
      vector<MarshallDeputy> md_cmd;
      for (auto& cmd_ptr : cmd) {
        MarshallDeputy md(cmd_ptr);
        md_cmd.push_back(md);
      }

      //Log_info("Failing here ");
      Call_Async(proxy, AppendEntries, md_cmd, terms, leaderId , leaderTerm, prevLogIndex,prevLogTerm, leaderCommitIndex, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}

shared_ptr<IntEvent> 
RaftCommo::SendString(parid_t par_id, siteid_t site_id, const string& msg, string* res) {
  auto proxies = rpc_par_proxies_[par_id];
  auto ev = Reactor::CreateSpEvent<IntEvent>();
  for (auto& p : proxies) {
    if (p.first == site_id) {
      RaftProxy *proxy = (RaftProxy*) p.second;
      FutureAttr fuattr;
      fuattr.callback = [res,ev](Future* fu) {
        fu->get_reply() >> *res;
        ev->Set(1);
      };
      /* wrap Marshallable in a MarshallDeputy to send over RPC */
      Call_Async(proxy, HelloRpc, msg, fuattr);
    }
  }
  return ev;
}


} // namespace janus
